blogPost.excerpt:
The Tiny Desk is working from home for the foreseeable future. Introducing NPR Music's Tiny Desk (home) concerts, bringing you performances from across the country and the world. It's the same spirit — stripped-down sets, an intimate setting — just a different space.

Stephen Thompson | March 17, 2021
If you were to apply one of those "how it started / how it's going" memes to Tiny Desk (home) concerts — which began, it turns out, almost exactly one year ago — you'd have, under "how it's going," the image of pop superstar Justin Bieber as he and his band perform the world premiere of a new song called "Peaches."

"Peaches" will exist in a significantly different form when Bieber drops his new album Justice on Friday — the track will feature guest vocals from GIVEŌN and Daniel Caesar — just as "Holy," another song from Justice, opens this set without the presence of guest Chance the Rapper. But Bieber's Tiny Desk set, performed with the aid of We the Band, provides the fullest taste yet (fully 25 percent!) of the singer's sixth album, whose singles have already been streamed hundreds of millions of times.

Bieber has had a massive month as he prepares for Justice to drop: March 2021 began with the singer's 27th birthday and recently produced his second career Grammy, as he took the prize for best country duo or group performance for "10,000 Hours" with Dan + Shay. It continues with this, his Tiny Desk debut. Friday, the next chapter officially begins.

SET LIST
"Holy"
"Peaches"
"Hold On"
"Anyone"

MUSICIANS
Justin Bieber: vocals, keys
Harv: bass
O'Neil "Doctor O" Palmer: keys
DJ Tay James: DJ
Robert Taylor: drums
Julian McGuire: guitar

CREDITS
Video: Nick Demoura, Mike Drew, Rory Kramer, Aaron Kroger, James Coker
Audio: Jim Ebdon, Dylan Ely, James Roach, Chris Houghton, Taylor Meyer
Production Manager: Chris Gratton
Camera Operators: Austin Wavra, Daniel Mardoyan, Noel Galan
Lighting Tech: Jim Mecsery

TINY DESK TEAM
Producer: Bobby Carter
Video Producers: Maia Stern, Morgan Noelle Smith
Audio Mastering: Josh Rogosin
Tiny Production Team: Bob Boilen, Kara Frame
Executive Producer: Lauren Onkey
Senior VP, Programming: Anya Grundmann

#justinbieber #tinydesk #nprmusic #pop #rnb

The Tiny Desk is working from home for the foreseeable future. Introducing NPR Music's Tiny Desk (home) concerts, bringing you performances from across the country and the world. It's the same spirit — stripped-down sets, an intimate setting — just a different space.

If you were to apply one of those "how it started / how it's going" memes to Tiny Desk (home) concerts — which began, it turns out, almost exactly one year ago — you'd have, under "how it's going," the image of pop superstar Justin Bieber as he and his band perform the world premiere of a new song called "Peaches."

localize.title: 贾斯汀-比伯。Tiny Desk (Home) Concert
localize.description:
在可预见的未来，Tiny Desk将在家工作。介绍NPR音乐的Tiny Desk（家庭）音乐会，为你带来来自全国和全世界的演出。













斯蒂芬-汤普森｜2021年3月17日
如果你把那些 "如何开始/如何发展 "的备忘录应用到Tiny Desk（家庭）音乐会上--事实证明，这几乎正好是一年前开始的--你会在 "如何发展 "下看到流行巨星贾斯汀-比伯的形象，因为他和他的乐队正在进行一首名为 "桃子 "的新歌的全球首唱。

"Peaches "将在周五比伯发行新专辑《Justice》时以明显不同的形式存在--这首歌曲将由GIVEŌN和Daniel Caesar客串演唱--就像《Justice》的另一首歌曲 "Holy "一样，在没有嘉宾Chance the Rapper存在的情况下开启了本场演出。但比伯在We the Band的协助下进行的Tiny Desk演出，提供了这位歌手第六张专辑迄今为止最完整的味道（足足有25%！），其单曲已经被流传了数亿次。

比伯在为《正义》的落幕做准备时，度过了一个庞大的月份。2021年3月是这位歌手27岁生日的开始 最近他获得了他职业生涯中的第二个格莱美奖 因为他和Dan+Shay的 "10,000小时 "获得了最佳乡村组合或团体表演奖。它继续与此，他的Tiny Desk首次亮相。周五，下一章正式开始。

设置列表
"圣"
"桃子"
"等一下"
"任何人"

音乐家
Justin Bieber：主唱、键盘
哈弗：贝斯
O'Neil "Doctor O "Palmer：钥匙。
DJ Tay James DJ
Robert Taylor：鼓
Julian McGuire：吉他

学分
视频： Nick Demoura, Mike Drew, Rory Kramer, Aaron Kroger, James Coker
音响：Jim Ebdon，Dylan Ely， Jim Ebdon, Dylan Ely, James Roach, Chris Houghton, Taylor Meyer
生产经理：Chris Gratton Chris Gratton
摄像师： Austin Wavra, Daniel Mardoyan, Noel Galan Austin Wavra, Daniel Mardoyan, Noel Galan.
灯光技术：Jim Mecsery Jim Mecsery

TINY办公桌团队
制片人： Bobby Carter
视频制作人： Maia Stern, Morgan Noelle Smith Maia Stern, Morgan Noelle Smith
音频母带制作。Josh Rogosin
Tiny制作团队： Bob Boilen, Kara Frame
执行制片人： Lauren Onkey
高级副总裁，编程。Anya Grundmann

#justinbieber #tinydesk #nprmusic #pop #rnb

localize.title: 賈斯汀-比伯。Tiny Desk (Home) Concert
localize.description:
在可預見的未來，Tiny Desk將在家工作。介紹NPR音樂的Tiny Desk（家庭）音樂會，爲你帶來來自全國和全世界的演出。













斯蒂芬-湯普森｜2021年3月17日
如果你把那些 "如何開始/如何發展 "的備忘錄應用到Tiny Desk（家庭）音樂會上--事實證明，這幾乎正好是一年前開始的--你會在 "如何發展 "下看到流行巨星賈斯汀-比伯的形象，因爲他和他的樂隊正在進行一首名爲 "桃子 "的新歌的全球首唱。

"Peaches "將在週五比伯發行新專輯《Justice》時以明顯不同的形式存在--這首歌曲將由GIVEŌN和Daniel Caesar客串演唱--就像《Justice》的另一首歌曲 "Holy "一樣，在沒有嘉賓Chance the Rapper存在的情況下開啓了本場演出。但比伯在We the Band的協助下進行的Tiny Desk演出，提供了這位歌手第六張專輯迄今爲止最完整的味道（足足有25%！），其單曲已經被流傳了數億次。

比伯在爲《正義》的落幕做準備時，度過了一個龐大的月份。2021年3月是這位歌手27歲生日的開始 最近他獲得了他職業生涯中的第二個格萊美獎 因爲他和Dan+Shay的 "10,000小時 "獲得了最佳鄉村組合或團體表演獎。它繼續與此，他的Tiny Desk首次亮相。週五，下一章正式開始。

設置列表
"聖"
"桃子"
"等一下"
"任何人"

音樂家
Justin Bieber：主唱、鍵盤
哈弗：貝斯
O'Neil "Doctor O "Palmer：鑰匙。
DJ Tay James DJ
Robert Taylor：鼓
Julian McGuire：吉他

學分
視頻： Nick Demoura, Mike Drew, Rory Kramer, Aaron Kroger, James Coker
音響：Jim Ebdon，Dylan Ely， Jim Ebdon, Dylan Ely, James Roach, Chris Houghton, Taylor Meyer
生產經理：Chris Gratton Chris Gratton
攝像師： Austin Wavra, Daniel Mardoyan, Noel Galan Austin Wavra, Daniel Mardoyan, Noel Galan.
燈光技術：Jim Mecsery Jim Mecsery

TINY辦公桌團隊
製片人： Bobby Carter
視頻製作人： Maia Stern, Morgan Noelle Smith Maia Stern, Morgan Noelle Smith
音頻母帶製作。Josh Rogosin
Tiny製作團隊： Bob Boilen, Kara Frame
執行製片人： Lauren Onkey
高級副總裁，編程。Anya Grundmann

#justinbieber #tinydesk #nprmusic #pop #rnb
